Development proposals for affordable housing should demonstrate that: a. they are not externally distinguishable in quality from private HOMES FOR THE COMMUNITY housing; b. low cost rented family units should include a mix of units which offer homes with open plan living spaces and separate kitchen and living rooms; and c. should have well-appointed and adequately sized entrance lobby areas.
